com.joliciel.talismane

Class Annotation<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.Annotation<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the data added by this annotation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Annotation<?>>

    public final class Annotation<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Annotation<?>>
    Annotation added to a continuous span of text. Examples could include identifying a named entity, identifying token boundaries, or identifying sentence boundaries. Note: the Comparable methods only provide span ordering, and are inconsistent with equals, which takes the data into account as well. Span ordering is by start index, and for equal start indexes, from longest span to shortest.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
